text: The men's C-1 500 metres competition at the 2018 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Montemor-o-Velho took place at the Centro de Alto Rendimento de Montemor-o-Velho. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Thursday 23 August 2018 || 11:41 || Heats |- | rowspan=3|Friday 24 August 2018 || 11:20 || Semifinals |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 16:31 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |- | 17:11 || Final B |} All times are Western European Summer Time (UTC+1) ==Results== ===Heats=== Heat winners advanced directly to the A final. The next six fastest boats in each heat advanced to the semifinals. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Canoeist !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=bbffbb | 1 | align="left"| | 2:15.251 | |} ===Semifinals=== Qualification was as follows: The fastest three boats in each semi advanced to the A final. The next four fastest boats in each semi, plus the fastest remaining boat advanced to the B final. ====Semifinal 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" !Rank !Canoeist !Country !Time
